definitions.definition: An improvement or supplement that tends to increase a sense of esteem.
examples: The original product, with its simplistic design, has undergone many enhancements over the years.

definitions.definition: The degree to which the image of a scan stands out as a bright area.

main_definition: An improvement or supplement that tends to increase a sense of esteem.
secondary_definitions: ( radiology ) The degree to which the image of a scan stands out as a bright area.
